system.requirements:
Tier 1; Agility 30
Aptitudes: Weapon Skill, Defence, Unaligned
system.effect: If in close combat, may use Full Action to make opposed WS test against foe, if test is won, opponents weapon is dropped, if won by 3 or more degrees of success, opponent's weapon is taken by character.
